website_summaries.verdict: These cute cozy sheets are waterproof, so there's no need for a separate protective liner or pad cover.
pros: Eco-friendly TPU lining with no seams to prevent leakage
Fits bassinets and mini co-sleepers, too
Reinforced twice with an elastic band
cons: Instructions state you should hang to dry
Some have dried on low in the dryer, but be forewarned

customer_reviews.title: Not for the Halo Swivel Sleeper
customer_reviews.text: These bassinet sheets do not fit well on the Halo Bassinet Swivel Sleeper despite the Sellers note in the questions section. It is an elastic fitted sheet rather than the envelope style that comes with the Halo, and it does not fit the unique curve of the Halo mattress. The elastic also makes the mattress bow. The sheets are otherwise soft and come at a good price for the pack, so probably a better deal for another bassinet mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Big N.

customer_reviews.title: Hang to dry?!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't put these on yet. They seem soft enough BUT just so you know... They're machine wash but HANG TO DRY. It took two full days for these to dry. Seriously?? Who makes a sheet for a baby that can't be washed and dried easily?!
customer_reviews.author: Janat Utley

customer_reviews.title: Hope they make more designs!
customer_reviews.text: Inherited a second hand Arms Reach original cosleeper and needed a fitted sheet and waterproof pad. This sheet seemed to fit the bill, so bought the 2 pack since it was reasonably priced. Love that the sheets have a waterproof underside (haven't seen other products like this) but like other reviewers have pointed out, the only downside is that it will take a while to dry when laundered (manufacturer tag indicates it needs to be hung dry). So having the 2nd sheet is a plus while the first one is drying out. 😃 Hope they come out with more designs for this type of sheet.
customer_reviews.author: 143amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product !
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints. These really are water proof but absorb any liquids. My baby has been spitting up lately and these liners do their job. Our bassinet is a Graco & doubles as a changing table. It’s a rectangle with rounded edges and these fit perfect. They seem like they would fit a lot of different mattresses since they have the elastic edges (?). They are soft and I just toss it in with the rest of my laundry. I didn’t want to buy covers and a water proof liner for a bassinet I wouldn’t be using for long so these were just perfect 💓
customer_reviews.author: s h a n o n

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control?
customer_reviews.text: I have 8 of these because they are great on the bassinet but the latest pair I purchased didn't make it through the wash and I don't quite understand why. I washed two of them in the same load and one did just fine and the other one is all stuck together and unusable. None of the others that I've purchased have done this but this latest pair is a bust. Not sure how I want to rate them because the ones that aren't destroyed are great but since 2 of them didn't hold up as well as the other 6 I feel like I wasted money buying the last set.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Neutral and highly functional
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are pretty high on my “must have” list. The fact that they are waterproof themselves without having to use a mattress pad also is key for having a newborn who spits up a lot, especially for middle of the night changes. These sheets are simple, neutral, soft, and have held up to A LOT of washing. I would be sure to keep your dryer on low heat when drying them though so as to protect the waterproof backing.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are super soft. Love that it's an all in one waterproof sheet. But they just barely fit the pack n play mattress. Would've been perfect if it were just a 1/2 in longer. Takes a bit long to dry because it holds pools of water, but that just means the waterproof part is working, so I guess that's a good thing. One of them sat in our washing machine too long (who has time with a baby anyways lol) and now the waterproof backing is pulling away from the sheet. It's all still intact, it's just a bit loose, so hopefully still works.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great Pack N Play Sheet
customer_reviews.text: I love that this sheet is lined to help protect the unwashable PnP mattresses. This is a great purchase to go along with any PnP purchase. These sheets wash well in the washer machine, but we do hang dry them as I do worry that the inside plastic liner could melt in the dyer. Also, note I don't dry my son's full mattress protector either for that same reason/fear. The quality of these seems great and very durable. Strong stitches so you don't have to worry about it unraveling or anything, I would buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Totallycrazyck

customer_reviews.title: Extra Protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son's daycare. It creeped me out that he would be using a pack and play that belonged to another child and I was not the one to clean it. I thought this would be a great barrier to use more so then a typical sheet. I loved them so much when I got them I bought another pack to use at home. It works great keeping his pack and play pad dry if he spits up or leaks. I just wish they made more designs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these sheets
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets. I got a set for the pack and play bassinet and changing pad. The material is so soft! I wish they made sheets for my bed!
customer_reviews.author: mia

customer_reviews.title: Great for my graco pack and play pad
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect sheet set for the pack and play we have. The fact that it comes with 2 sheets is great so if he spits up or pees through a diaper we can just pop the other clean/dry one on. We are currently using it with the bassinet part of the pack and play and while is does create a small gap when using the with bassinet- my son doesn’t roll yet and stays in one spot- so it has not been an issue. I’m not sure if it creates a similar gap when the bassinet part is removed and the pack and play pad is at the bottom. So far, I’m very happy with the sheet set.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Stacklie

customer_reviews.title: Pulls the pad “in”
customer_reviews.text: Great material... just doesn’t fit my Halo bassinet pad very well. If you look at the picture, you’ll note that when I put it on, it folds the pad. If the pad was thicker, it would’ve worked. But now that it pulls the pad in, the pad doesn’t lay flat in the bassinet. So, I would rather pay more money and buy the actual Halo pad sheet.
customer_reviews.author: abdul maiwand

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these sheets but both waterproof linings have shrunk up after almost 3 months use. I peeled the lining out of the chevron one so i could keep using it as a regular sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Fit, washability, durability are all good!
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof bassinet sheets are a must! They will save you from ruining your bassinet mattress. I love these covers. They fit well on my Ingenuity Foldaway Rocking Bassinet - fits snug and tight, as it should. They are not a super soft fabric, but I don't feel that that matters for an infant's bed. They clean up very nicely in the washing machine. Instructions say to air dry, which is what I've been doing since I assume that will help them to last longer. Air drying bassinet covers isn't always practical, but with a 2 pack, it hasn't been a problem for me. I would buy these again and I recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Carol

customer_reviews.title: It makes changing the sheets nice and easy
customer_reviews.text: These cute sheets fit our Arm's Reach co-sleeper very well. It makes changing the sheets nice and easy. I did have an issue with washing - the directions on the sheets were to machine wash/dry, but upon doing so the waterproof backing came away from the sheet and tore. When I wrote to the company to let them know what happened, they sent out a new package. The new package had different directions of machine wash, hang dry. They do take awhile to dry while hanging, but the quality has held up.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah N

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you’re looking for
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and definitely waterproof! I have a baby who spits up a lot and these sheets have saved our bassinet mattress! They are thick with a rubber sheet like backing but the top of the sheet (where the baby will sleep) is so soft and comfortable. When they’re dirty I throw them in the washing machine and dryer without issue, they have held up to countless washes so far! I definitely would buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not enough give for larger soft mattress
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this “fits all” waterproof sheet but the fitted part doesn’t have enough give for larger mattresses that are NOT rigid. Instead, it just bunches up the bassinet mattress. Added photos and mattress pad size for reference.
customer_reviews.author: APC

customer_reviews.title: Don't put them in hot dryer
customer_reviews.text: Nice sheets. Too bad I put them in hot dryer...kept forgetting to remove them from the normal wash as I transferred it to the dryer. The hot dryer ruined the waterproof lining. I might not purchase them again considering that they can't take the heat. The sheets do feel good though, and if you can manage to remember to not place them in a hot dryer, I'd highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Biker

customer_reviews.title: Great Sheets for the MiClassic Portable/Travel Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I expected! They don't leak through at all which was a huge plus for me. I would recommend buying two packs of sheets just incase of multiple diaper accidents before you can get to washing the sheets (life with a newborn can be crazy and washing these sheets will be the last thing on your mind I'm sure), but I love them! 10/10 recommend for this bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Rosell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect waterproof sheets
customer_reviews.text: These are great!! My 6 month old son peed through everything last night, so I took the sheet off and put the second one in seconds. They fit my Delta pac-n-play wonderfully. They are very convenient, great for boy or girl, and machine washable. For those who are having problems washing, don't use hot water and make sure your dryer is on low and drying with other towels/clothes. You can also dry it for 15-20 minutes and take it out to air dry the rest if you're worried about the plastic melting.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this product. We registered for this brand for our changing table, bassinet, and pack and play. The only one that is holding up is the pack and play. The quality is terrible after a few washes. While the style and design seem great, I can't believe after 3 washes the sheets are totally ruined. I would recommend a different brand if you are looking to purchase this for your changing table or bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: kleonard1122

customer_reviews.title: the waterproofing separated from the cloth
customer_reviews.text: I loved how cute these are....but that is where it ended. By the 3rd washing in cold water and line drying the waterproofing separated from the cloth. I have used wet bags and cloth diapers so I felt confident that I could make these last a long time since I know to wash in cold and line dry....I would not recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J or S Haggy

customer_reviews.title: Soft waterproof sheets
customer_reviews.text: Very soft waterproof sheets that don't make annoying crinkle noises. I've machine washed and dried these several times and have not had any problems. I only have one problem...i use these in a Graco pack n play and the sheet is actually so tight fitting that the mattress (which is foldable) won't lie flat. It's a little annoying, but i can live with it. Wish it fit a bit better though.
customer_reviews.author: kairynel

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely waterproof, the liquid just pools up on top . I’d like them more if it at least soaked in to the top layer a bit so there wasn’t puddles. Also the care instructions say not to use high heat because it’s plastic on the back . Wish these were more like changing pad liners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bassinet sheet did not fit our Simmons Gliding Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these did not fit our bassinet as I thought they would when I selected this product for our baby registry. We have been using the sheets on our summer infant contoured changing pad instead. Except for the name, these bassinet sheets are exactly the same size and composition as the Waterproof Changing Pad Cover Set. Neither fit the changing pad well, but we're making it work. I really like that they are waterproof - we've had no seepage - and after 4 months of about once a week washing they seem to be holding up well. Disappointed they don't fit any of our baby gear well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof sheets!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I love that I only need one sheet. These have worked great for my little one. Even though he had many accidents, I’m so glad I didn’t have to worry about the bassinet getting wet. These are easy to wash and clean well in the washing machine. I also love the patterns! They also fit great on my bassinet mattress. Overall very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for sizing
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because i thought they're supposed to fit different sized mattresses. I have a bassinet and also a smaller, co-sleeping basket. The sheets aren't even close to fitting the bassinet mattress, and are so tight on the basket mattress that the little mattress tends to curl up a little bit when I put the sheet on it, and won't really lay flat until I shove it down and lay my baby down on top of it. I like the prints and material, but they ended up being much less useful than I'd hoped
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: It's a really awesome design, and quality is really great
customer_reviews.text: It's a really awesome design, and quality is really great. BUT it doesn't fit any bassinet mat. We've tried 2 different size and types and it scrunched up the mat , basically making a big lump in the mat. Which I can't imagine would be comfortable for our baby. I was really hoping for a waterproof sheet. Will probably be returning these....
customer_reviews.author: J bean

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sheets, did not work with our bassinet
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are adorable, and appear to be of great quality. Sadly, I have to send them back, as they made my bassinet mattress curl up, and no longer be safe. If your bassinet mattress has a stiff backing on it, that will not allow it to curl or fold, these will be great!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Foster

customer_reviews.title: Wife likes these
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes these so much more than regular cotton sheets. Cotton sheets absorb everything. These sheets will repel spitup, which you can wipe right up as long as you don't let it sit there forever.
customer_reviews.author: CSSMITH

customer_reviews.title: Okay so far.
customer_reviews.text: Soft, tight fit, nice print. The waterproof backing layer feels way more delicate than I was expecting, though. Definitely not ever putting it in the dryer. I've had other items with the same backing that also said machine dry on low and they blistered, cracked, and peeled within a couple weeks. As long as I air dry them, I think these sheets should hold up well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pack and Play Sheets
customer_reviews.text: I've only used these for about a week, so I can't speak to their longevity. That being said, they seem high quality, they are cute, and they are so much easier to slip on over the pack and play mattress than putting on a protector and a sheet. It means less to store as well! If I could do my purchasing over, I would start with these and get rid of my other sheets/protectors. For reference, we have used these in Graco and Eddie Bauer pack and plays on the included mattress pad. Our baby sleeps in the pack and play at night and for all naps. We have had no problems with these sheets coming off the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Megs13

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bc I liked the print. I have a chicco bassinet and these were too small causing the mat to buckle in the middle. I did check the measurements prior to purchasing and they should fit.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine S

customer_reviews.title: Great idea. Wish they were more durable.
customer_reviews.text: Work great and fit mwell. The reason for low stars is they wear out quickly. No matter washing on delicate by themselves and drying on air, the plastic starts separating from the cloth after about ten wages or so. I would still buy again since it’s cheaper than sheets and waterproof pads. They are waterproof and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Kisha Kruse

customer_reviews.title: They seem like great sheets
customer_reviews.text: They seem like great sheets. So far I've only received, washed, dried, and folded them. Once babies come and use them I'll update this review. Note on drying: do not put in dryer. I hung them up in my shower since they do get quite wet in the wash. They take about a day to dry so I bought 2 packs. I specifically bought these to fit the "LA Baby 3" Mini/Portable Crib Mattress with Soy Foam Core and Blended Organic Cotton Cover" to go in our DaVinci Emily mini crib and the sheets fit perfectly. So happy about that!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Matson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Fisher Price Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: We have a fisher price bassinet & these fit perfectly. Easy to wash and dry and are very similar to cover that came on the pad.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets. Bad service and sizing
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They’re easy to clean and the only waterproof sheets I’ve found at a decent price. The sizes are inaccurate though. The bassinet fit my changing table. Also, when I ordered a second set of sheets (playpen size for the bassinet) they were never shipped and I had to cancel my order
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product has been wonderful. The material is soft on the top and ...
customer_reviews.text: This product has been wonderful. The material is soft on the top and is waterproof on the underside. This sheet has been very helpful as I keep my daughter in my room in her pack and play. This sheet prevents the pad from getting dirty from her frequent spitting up. The only thing I am not 100% happy about is it is not as tight around the pad as I would like. All in all I am happy with this product and would recommend it to everyone with little ones!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits a mini crib mattress
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our mini crib mattress and they fit very well so, we bought a second set. Not sure how waterproof they are as our baby is still in diapers and we haven’t had to put it to the test.
customer_reviews.author: izzy_izo

customer_reviews.title: Works Well for Pack n Play
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. These eliminated the need for a fitted sheet or any other sheet. I wanted a sheet that still felt nice, was fitted and waterproof, which these are all of those. I have them on my son's Graco Pack n Play mattress.
customer_reviews.author: stalloned

customer_reviews.title: LIKE!
customer_reviews.text: I really like that these sheets are lined with a waterproof liner and that the sheet is soft. It fits the Pack and Play mattress well, extending well beyond the corners to stay on well. The items are just as represented, arrived right away in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Clarise Watson

customer_reviews.title: Loved It!
customer_reviews.text: The cloth side was soft against baby's skin, and the waterproofing kept the bassinet pad from getting wet in case of any accidents or spit up. Stood up in the dryer on low heat very well. A bit stiff due to waterproof lining, but easily stretched over bassinet pad.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets
customer_reviews.text: Im very happy I bought this for the bassinett. The colors match perfectly as well. It does take a bit to flatten out the bassinett mattress due to the sheet but once done its good to go.
customer_reviews.author: graphitegray

customer_reviews.title: These were nice sheets for the little time I used for my ...
customer_reviews.text: These were nice sheets for the little time I used for my newborn. Wash up nicely & the design I thought was cute on them. Never had any accidents however to test the waterproofness of them so to speak so that I don't have a review for. Only used for about 7 weeks but thought they did a nice job & served their purpose
customer_reviews.author: Randy N

customer_reviews.title: Great all in one
customer_reviews.text: These work great! We have been using these for a month, they have been well tested and washed several times. They are waterproof but soft like any regular sheet and they are easy to wash, no special care needed. Would recommend and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: My only complaint is that it does not fit a Graco pack and play like a glove
customer_reviews.text: So practical to have the sheet be waterproof, instead of two separate items. My only complaint is that it does not fit a Graco pack and play like a glove, but fits it well enough to use. The two-pack packaging is great, for a quick change when a blow-out happens. Washing advice: put it in a mesh laundry bag when washing and drying, to prevent flaking of the waterproof material.
customer_reviews.author: DLC

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit pack'n'play very well but waterproofing amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These work, but if you are using a pack'n'play where the mattress folds up then the elastic on the bottom of these will make the mattress pucker and not lie flat. However, having these waterproof sheets as opposed to a waterproof mattress cover then sheets was worth it to have the mattress puckering.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT fit Arms Reach Co Sleeper
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of these sheets and that they were water resistant, but they do NOT fit my arms reach co sleeper. I’ve returned them just for that reason. Otherwise they were super soft, looked water resistant and were cute. Maybe they’ll work for a different bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Howard

customer_reviews.title: The company was easy to work with though
customer_reviews.text: My first order was defective, they were ripped. The company was easy to work with though. They refunded me my money and sent me a new set of sheets. I haven’t tried washing my new set of sheets yet, but they seem like good quality.
customer_reviews.author: It'sme

customer_reviews.title: From the Pack 'n Play to daycare - a great all-purpose sheet!
customer_reviews.text: The best sheet ever! It's soft and durable as well as machine washable and dryable. This is my second set and my first set is still as good as the new set I just purchased. I love that over the years, it is still waterproof and works well. I use it in our Pack 'n Play (or any other branded portable crib) and use it for daycare.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Water resistant backing tore after a couple washes. Does not fit bassinet well. Too tight and buckles the mattress
customer_reviews.author: JennW

customer_reviews.title: Good value, durable.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is now almost two and my original set has finally started to degrade. I used these daily for well over a year to help protect her pack and play mat from food, drinks, and messes from diaper air out time. I only air dry them and think it helped maintain the plastic barrier backing better.
customer_reviews.author: Heather America

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These fit my portable bassinet perfectly. Nice and soft and held up well in the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Ladeeda

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit halo bassinest at all
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit halo bassinest at all. In one of the questions, it stated that it would fit. It is far too small and I have now washed it so can't return it. Fits nothing in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: This cover did not sadly fit my bassinet pad. It was probably 50% smaller than what I need. Make sure and measure before ordering! Other this that, it’s great quality-just doesn’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: whitney

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are absolutely waterproof, yet soft, washable, and cute. I wish there were more designs and colors to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: melz

customer_reviews.title: Causes mattress to bubble/bunch up.  Not safe.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit the bassinet mattress. It makes the mattress bubble up. That's not condusive for safe sleep practices.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Soft but waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are soft and don’t seem like they would be water proof, but today I spilled half a bottle of milk on them and it wiped right off. Fits Arm’s Reach Bassinet perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the super thin mattress I have in mine cant hold form
customer_reviews.text: They should have just made them for the different bassinet mattress sizes. Because they stretch to fit, the super thin mattress I have in mine cant hold form.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Fox

customer_reviews.title: Shrinks
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this and initially it did fit the bassinet. But after one wash the sheets shrunk significantly and now it makes the “mattress” for the bassinet bunch together creating a giant lump in the middle for the mi classic. I want to buy more sheets bc other than that, it really is water/puke/pee resistant but now I don’t think so and I have to figure out what to buy now.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Guzman

customer_reviews.title: SIDS risk to high
customer_reviews.text: Because these are not breathable I’m afraid to use them on my bassinet. Threw away the box so I am stuck with them
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Dale

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit standard bassinet mattress
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit our standard sized bassinet. I can just barely get it on, and it's so tight that it squishes the mattress, creating a big ridge in the middle. Cannot use, very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: BonnieMadison

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Not Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler had her first accident on these sheets today and although I pulled all the bedding off immediately, the mattress underneath was still soaked. I bought these specifically for the waterproof feature, so I'll be throwing them out now and looking for an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a waterproof bassient sheet for our Chicco Lullago Portable bassinet. These sheets fit almost perfectly. Haven't tested the waterproof bit yet but so far happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S.C.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit like described
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t fit the bassinet well it makes the pad fold up and it’s not the softest material!
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Wish I tried it on before washing it... too big for my bassinet, despite their description
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my baby trend bassinet, but it’s too big (even though it should fit according the description) and there’s too much loose fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Raya G

customer_reviews.title: Nice sheets for new baby
customer_reviews.text: The sheets were a gift. The new mother said they were great.
customer_reviews.author: M. M M.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great pack and play sheets and work to contain baby spit ups.
customer_reviews.author: JE135

customer_reviews.title: Fits very well
customer_reviews.text: I had bought different covers for my chicco lullago bassinet but none seemed to fit the oval shape the right way. However these were perfect. the fit the bed exactly anx are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Salas

customer_reviews.title: Drying
customer_reviews.text: Make sure when you dry the sheets, you dry them on a low setting. If not, the mattress protector lining will melt. They do take a long time to dry as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutly love these. I was using a diffrent sheet but it was time to replace them. I found these and liked that they were waterproof and thought I would give them a try. They are a thicker due to the waterproof backing, but still soft. They washed and dried without a problem. I only wished they had more colors!
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are stylish and fit perfectly in my Graco pack n play. They are waterproof which is key for me because my baby has reflux and spits up often. I thought the shiny inner waterproof coating would crack or chip in the wash and dryer but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Cold Wash and No Heat Dry.
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are great except they have to be washed in cold water and dried on no heat. If not the plastic separates from the sheet and melts. It's a mess! Other wise if you keep this in mind they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Patty.

customer_reviews.title: These are great sheets. The quality and design are perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are great sheets. The quality and design are perfect. I understand the reviewers who stated that they were difficult to dry, but I put them in the dryer inside out on air fluff only and then hung them on a hook for final drying. I figure as long as I always have one clean, I'm ok. I'm glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: cps

customer_reviews.title: Good sheets at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Sheets fit great on the bassinet I bought. Glad I went with waterproof ones with all the spit up & accidents the baby has I'm only washing the sheet and not the whole bassinet. They've held up the few washes I've done. No problems or complaints! I'd definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: TwoPupsAndABoy

customer_reviews.title: Don't fit the Arm's Reach Clear-Vue Co-Sleeper
customer_reviews.text: Definitely check the dimensions of your co-sleeper or bassinet before purchasing these. While they say they fit mini cosleepers, they made the mattress bow too much for me to use them. For reference, I have an Arm's Reach Clear-Vue Co-Sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive the color that I ordered and the sheets that I received are not waterproof . That was the main reason I purchased these was because I needed a waterproof sheet for the pack n play.
customer_reviews.author: JCReview

customer_reviews.title: Got the job done
customer_reviews.text: Loved but bunched up bassinet mat and made it bend too easily
customer_reviews.author: Steph K

customer_reviews.title: Soft Sheet. Good Fit.
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased these for Graco Pack ‘N Play. They fit well, better than the Graco sheets. They are soft and the water proof layer is a nice touch. I’ve only washed and dried once, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: UVAJen

customer_reviews.title: My baby spits up a lot and I was cleaning ...
customer_reviews.text: My baby spits up a lot and I was cleaning the bassinet mattress cover at minimum once a week. Now the spitup just wipes off and I wash the sheet once a week or so.
customer_reviews.author: LCB

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described! Fit my bassinet perfectly! I didn’t realize that the sheet is lined which is perfect for protecting the mattress or changing pad
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to fit the bassinet that we bought and it didn’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have many brands of crib sheets and these are by far the most comfortable! I went back and ordered the pack-and-play size ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the softest sheets I have ever had! I have many brands of crib sheets and these are by far the most comfortable! I went back and ordered the pack-and-play size as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great! I just let them air dry outside
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I just let them air dry outside. It fits my pack and play matress pad thats about 2” thick just fine. Its a soft sheet with the waterproof liner on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our pack and play
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to take with us on vacation. We use our pack and play for a crib and needed covers for the mattress. These were perfect! I especially loved that they are a mattress sheet and mattress protector in 1 product. Great quality and cute too. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Fits Chicco Lullago Bassinet Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly for the Chicco Lullago Bassinet! I haven't washed them yet so not sure how the waterproofing will hold up. But so far I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Almost useless
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are too small for any of our mattresses or pads (and we have 3). The elastic is so tight, I ended up cutting the elastic at all 4 sides to use on our smallest bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Wethington

customer_reviews.title: A bit big for uppa baby bassinet
customer_reviews.text: A bit baggy on the uppa baby bassinet. Looks a little sloppy but does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P

customer_reviews.title: Great mini crib sheets!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets fit our mini crib perfectly! I love that they pull double duty as a mattress cover and a sheet. It's a bummer that you can't put them in the dryer (thus taking longer to dry), but hanging them up to dry overnight isn't a problem. I only wish that they came in more colors and designs!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: That water proofing is a plastic like coating on the sheet. It easily flakes off, i followed the washing directions exactly.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyKittens

customer_reviews.title: This is a changing table cover
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, but had to return due to the size being misleading. States that it fits a cradle, but it was half the size of the mattress. This product size is more suited for a changing table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: They are the perfect size for baby trend pack and play bassinet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for crib cradle.
customer_reviews.text: I really like that these sheets protect the mattress from accidents. They don't fit as snug on my crib cradle as I would like but we make it work. Maybe I got the wrong size though but I don't think so.
customer_reviews.author: Lindse

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the bassinet. 2 in 1 benefit with the water proof lining. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela's view

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: will purchase another set. love the "Waterproof" part.. its not noisy!
customer_reviews.author: victoria a

customer_reviews.title: Soft AND waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute design. But more importantly, I love the waterproof backing and soft front. I even added a mattress topper to the portable crib mattress and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Willis

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use on a pack n play crib for my grandson. They are very nice and soft and the waterproof layer is not crunchy sounding. You must follow the washing instructions and do not put them in the dryer as they fit nice and snug with no wrinkles or bunching. I wish I could find these for my daughter in the full crib size. Eliminates the need for 2 layers - waterproof pad and crib sheet in one.
customer_reviews.author: mswinnie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just bought and washed for the first time exactly by the label instructions. First wash both of the sheet’s waterproof lining ripped in multiple spots. Messaged the seller but no response. Wouldn’t purchase again not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Clair Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: Fits 3 inch mini mattress
customer_reviews.text: Fit our Babyletto mini crib mattress beautifully! These waterproof sheets are so soft and not crinkley. I love them. I am glad I bought two to have extra sheets on hand for late night sheet changes.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Nice sheets
customer_reviews.text: I think these are just what we need. I love the fact that you don't need a mattress pad in addition to the sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Diehlhill

product_meta.title: Waterproof Bassinet Sheet,No Need for Bassinet Mattress Pad Cover, 2 Pack Grey Chevron and Polka Dots,Unisex for Baby Boy and Baby Girl
feature_bullets: Waterproof: Bassinet Sheet with Mattress Pad Cover Protection
Unisex and Comfortable, Soft Material: 100% High Quality Jersey Knit Cotton in soft grey color ideal for both baby boy and baby girl
Flexible Fit:Fits all standard bassinet rectangle and oval matresses,Mini Co-Sleepers, as well as the Halo Matress. Ideal for Mattresses Dimensions: 32x16 inches
Easy Clean: Machine washable, lightweight fabric
Superior Safety: Tight elastic band, doubly reinforced for durability and safety with TPU waterproof lining to protect your baby from any germs coming from the mattress

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars904 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
